page.title: 20Niton School - 1985
page.content: Teachers at our school are not very strict about uniform but they like us to try and wear it.Our school colours are blue,white and grey.We have things like jumble sales,fetes and coffee mornings to raise money for equipment like our computers.All the children in the school use them,even the little ones.We have a library where we go to look things up and study.We all play together in one big playground and we have a super field as well.We have lessons like maths.,science,topic, writing and spelling.We go out a lot to learn all about Niton and the Island.Iam glad I go to school in 1985. * * * * * * * * * * Contributors _ Class 4 & Mary Hall, Niton School; Muriel French (Parish Cllr),Rev.T.Louden,R.Kinver(Light- housekeeper),S.Dabell,M.Stotesbury and M.Middleton.
